channel.title: Happy April Fools' Day!
channel.description: I'm posting this an hour early but obviously it's been the day for quite awhile. We have a hypnotist coming to our school tomorrow (hopefully THAT isn't a joke) but otherwise I'm going to spend the day making lame pranks against family and friends. If anything, what do you do for April Fools' Day?

item.title: Happy April Fools' Day!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona

Trololo.

fuuuuuu

Lol’d at StrikeMC, I will die if she calls you tomorrow, and goes, “April Fools!, had you going didn’t I?”
[/quote]

Don’t you get it? He said “trolololo” a few posts up. We got tricked, bro.[/quote]
Aah, didn’t actually pay attention to who that was lol, just read that and thought “moron”.

item.title: Happy April Fools' Day!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:19, topic:388972”][quote author=StrikeMC link=topic=484790.msg3553255#msg3553255 date=1301691376]
Worst day ever.

My girlfriend and I have been dating for nearly 8 years, and we’ve lived together for most of that time. Last month, I bought an engagement ring and proposed to her, and she happily said yes. I thought it’d be funny to play an awful prank on her for April Fools’ Day, and well, I was wrong.

Yesterday, I started acting a bit different and preoccupied, but just enough for her to take notice. Last night before we went to bed, I told her there was something really important we had to talk about today and I think she got a bit nervous. Today, I started a serious conversation with her and she was obviously very curious to know what it was about. I told her that I had fallen in love with another woman and that I no longer wanted to be with her. She immediately started crying and then proceeded to take the ring off and throw it at me. Obviously, I tried explaining that I wasn’t serious, but she wouldn’t believe anything I said. After saying a bunch of less than pleasent stuff to me, she got in our car and left. That was 5 hours ago. I’ve been trying to call her since then without any answer and I’ve left tens of messages.

Anybody else ruin their life today?
[/quote]
What the fuck 117 rep but this is your first post? and also thats not a funny joke you basically just ruined your life[/quote]

Look at the Minecraft section a little bit more, k?

Read full topic

item.title: Happy April Fools' Day!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:30, topic:388972”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=484790.msg3553411#msg3553411 date=1301698771]
I’m going balls to the wall. I’m changing my relationship status to single on facebook and then commenting on it like “We all know that good things have to come to an end.” Results will be fun.
[/quote]
Well Ill be here for you to cry to when you get dumped (: lol[/quote]
I asked her if I could do it and she said sure. At first I was trying to talk her into posting on FB that she’s pregnant. She’s pretty awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy April Fools' Day!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:21, topic:388972”][quote author=StrikeMC link=topic=484790.msg3553255#msg3553255 date=1301691376]
Worst day ever.

My girlfriend and I have been dating for nearly 8 years, and we’ve lived together for most of that time. Last month, I bought an engagement ring and proposed to her, and she happily said yes. I thought it’d be funny to play an awful prank on her for April Fools’ Day, and well, I was wrong.

Yesterday, I started acting a bit different and preoccupied, but just enough for her to take notice. Last night before we went to bed, I told her there was something really important we had to talk about today and I think she got a bit nervous. Today, I started a serious conversation with her and she was obviously very curious to know what it was about. I told her that I had fallen in love with another woman and that I no longer wanted to be with her. She immediately started crying and then proceeded to take the ring off and throw it at me. Obviously, I tried explaining that I wasn’t serious, but she wouldn’t believe anything I said. After saying a bunch of less than pleasent stuff to me, she got in our car and left. That was 5 hours ago. I’ve been trying to call her since then without any answer and I’ve left tens of messages.

Anybody else ruin their life today?
[/quote]
That wasn’t an april fools joke, that was pure douchebaggery…[/quote]
Girls don’t beleive in April fools day im finding out, I told my girl friend Shayna after she got out of school today that I was having an affair with her mom, she then proceded to kick me in the balls and throw a bowling ball on my leg. I even said it jokingly, then her mom came in laughing (not knowing she had given me a big fracture in my leg) said “no in your dreams hun”. Then they both started to laugh and now im in the hospital and missing out on pranking. Sigh P.S. I hate all of you <3

Read full topic

item.title: Happy April Fools' Day!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“StrikeMC, post:1, topic:389047”]Worst day ever.

My girlfriend and I have been dating for nearly 8 years, and we’ve lived together for most of that time. Last month, I bought an engagement ring and proposed to her, and she happily said yes. I thought it’d be funny to play an awful prank on her for April Fools’ Day, and well, I was wrong.

Yesterday, I started acting a bit different and preoccupied, but just enough for her to take notice. Last night before we went to bed, I told her there was something really important we had to talk about today and I think she got a bit nervous. Today, I started a serious conversation with her and she was obviously very curious to know what it was about. I told her that I had fallen in love with another woman and that I no longer wanted to be with her. She immediately started crying and then proceeded to take the ring off and throw it at me. Obviously, I tried explaining that I wasn’t serious, but she wouldn’t believe anything I said. After saying a bunch of less than pleasent stuff to me, she got in our car and left. That was 5 hours ago. I’ve been trying to call her since then without any answer and I’ve left tens of messages.

Anybody else ruin their life today? :|[/quote]
That wasn’t an april fools joke, that was pure douchebaggery…

Read full topic

The wiki devoted to RuneScape that anyone can edit. 42,252 articles since 8 April 2005. Wikia has removed the stripped-down Monobook skin from the wiki. If you were using it and need help using the main Oasis skin, see our editing guides or ask on...
